title: Graph the First Inequality
text: We must graph $$x>-4$$, which is a vertical line. We shade to the right.\n##figure2.gif##

title: Graph the Second Inequality
text: We must graph $$x-2y \geq -4$$, which rearranges to $$y \leq \frac{-\left(-4-x\right)}{2}$$. We shade below since we have $$ \leq $$.\n##figure4.gif##

title: The solution is region where shading overlaps: Blue-red
